tokens.name: Epsteinu / SOL

- **Limit Order:** Strong buying pressure (205/95 buy/sell ratio) and recent flow momentum justify **0% (market order)**.  
- **Take Profit:** Volume ($12,234) is **high** (> $10k), so TP is **+25%** (mid-range of +20%–+40%).  
- **Stop Loss:** Medium volatility (38.5% price change) and stable momentum suggest **-10%** (mid-range of -8%–-15%).  
- **Time Frame:** High volume and stable momentum align with **4h–1day** for trend-following.
